hymn.title: My heart is fixed, eternal God

layout.singingstanza: My heart is fixed, e -- ter -- nal God, Fixed on Thee, fixed on Thee; And my im -- mor -- tal choice is made, Christ for me, Christ for me; He is my pro -- phet, priest, and king, Who did for me sal -- va -- tion bring, And while I've breath I mean to sing, Christ for me, Christ for me.

lyrics.stanza: My heart is fixed, eternal God, Fixed on Thee, fixed on Thee; And my immortal choice is made, Christ for me, Christ for me; He is my prophet, priest, and king, Who did for me salvation bring, And while I've breath I mean to sing, Christ for me, Christ for me.

In Him I see the Godhead shine, Christ for me, Christ for me; He is the majesty divine, Christ for me, Christ for me; The Father's well-beloved Son, Co-partner of His royal throne, Who bore the guilt of man alone, Christ for me, Christ for me.

In pining sickness, or in health, Christ for me, Christ for me; In deepest poverty or wealth, Christ for me, Christ for me; And in that all-important day, When I the summons must obey, And pass from this dark world away, Christ for me, Christ for me.
